actions.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Neguse.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 116-42 to provide a rule of construction that nothing in this Act would require or prohibit the President from including in his plan recommendations to support integration of human-caused climate change into school curriculums.
purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 116-42 to provide a rule of construction that nothing in this Act would require or prohibit the President from including in his plan recommendations to support integration of human-caused climate change into school curriculums.
